EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #3 - EMEA - 2015.01.29.Email - Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Automate Agile Testing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Automate Agile Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Automate Agile Testing! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-agile-series-3-emea-watch.html> for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-sales Consulting Tricentis
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
